meanings.definition: A person or group of people who prepare or process items in a batch.
meanings.sent1: The batchers worked together to package the cookies.
meanings.sent2: The bakery hired new batchers to help with the morning rush.
meanings.sent3: The batchers accidentally mixed up the ingredients and created a new cookie flavor.
meanings.sent4: The batchers were like a well-oiled machine, efficiently processing each order.
meanings.sent5: The diligent batchers ensured that every product met the quality standards.

meanings.definition: The act of preparing or processing items in a batch.
meanings.sent1: The batchers of cupcakes were done in record time.
meanings.sent2: The company's success was due to the efficient batchers of products.
meanings.sent3: The batchers of paperwork were so fast, they finished before lunch.
meanings.sent4: The batchers of data organized everything neatly and accurately.
meanings.sent5: The careful batchers ensured no mistakes were made during processing.
